item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Starship's Sixth Flight Test (38 points | 15 comments)
2. ChatGPT now on chat.com (13 points | 4 comments)
3. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (186 points | 77 comments)
4. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (115 points | 41 comments)
5. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (139 points | 34 comments)
6. WebSockets cost us $1M on our AWS bill (7 points | 1 comment)
7. Launch HN: Midship (YC S24) – Turn PDFs and Images into usable data (12 points | 12 comments)
8. New images of Jupiter (326 points | 52 comments)
9. Useful built-in macOS command-line utilities (561 points | 140 comments)
10. Learning not to trust the All-In podcast (128 points | 32 comments)
11. Model Predictive Control in the Browser with WebAssembly (58 points | 7 comments)
12. Title drops in movies (411 points | 138 comments)
13. Show HN: Term-Lisp – A Lisp, based on pattern matching and term rewriting (23 points | 9 comments)
14. Monorepo – Our Experience (49 points | 63 comments)
15. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch (165 points | 110 comments)
16. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (100 points | 8 comments)
17. Trump wins presidency for second time (1321 points | 5786 comments)
18. 98.css – A design system for building faithful recreations of old UIs (286 points | 72 comments)
19. Only 5.3% of US welders are women. After years as a professor, I became one (192 points | 264 comments)
20. AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D Linux Performance: Zen 5 With 3D V-Cache (94 points | 55 comments)
21. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (15 points | 1 comment)
22. Show HN: Aide, an open-source AI native IDE (90 points | 78 comments)
23. Breaking the image: a 12th-century Ai Weiwei? (21 points | 17 comments)
24. Powering the Mars Base (77 points | 61 comments)
25. Upcoming changes to the DNSSEC root trust anchor (77 points | 23 comments)
26. 3D Rotation Design (62 points | 14 comments)
27. What has case distinction but is neither uppercase nor lowercase? (135 points | 59 comments)
28. Defibrillation devices save lives using 1k times less electricity (95 points | 53 comments)
29. EU opens antitrust investigation into anticompetitive practices by Corning (81 points | 14 comments)
30. Superstreamer – OSS streaming toolkit from video source to player (138 points | 8 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
